rules.fullName: CS Transferred to Client Support WF
Client Name and Number WF Rule
Cobra Notification of Company Shell WF
rules.formula: CONTAINS(Product_Summary__c, "COBRA") && (NOT(ISNULL(Calendar_Set_up__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Calendar Set up")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Earning_and_Deductions__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Earning and Deductions")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Check_Printing__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Check Printing")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Locations_Branches__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Locations/Branches")) && (NOT(ISNULL(State_Local_Tax_IDs__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "State/Local Tax IDs")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Reports__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Reports")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Earning_Code_Sets__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Earning Code Sets")) && (NOT(ISNULL(GL__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "GL")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Input_Worksheet__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Input Worksheet")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Workers_Comp_Codes__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Workers' Comp Codes")) && (NOT(ISNULL(X401K_Centers__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "401K Centers")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Billing__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Billing")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Tax_Exempts__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Tax Exempts")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Time_Off_Accrual__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Time Off Accrual Complete")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Agency_Checks__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Agency Checks Complete")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Sales__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Sales")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Misc_Options__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Misc Options")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Extra_Fields__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Extra Fields")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Company_Flags__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Company Flags")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Paychex_Options__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Paychex Options")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Conversion_Target_Date__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Conversion Target Date")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Delivery__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Delivery Complete")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Products__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Products")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Employee_Static__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Employee Static")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Recurring_Earning_Deductions__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Recurring Earning & Deductions")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Target_Balance__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Target Balance")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Locals_Setup__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Locals Setup")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Direct_Deposits__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Direct Deposits")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Remove_Prenotes__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Remove Prenotes")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Code_1099_s__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Code 1099's")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Verification_Kit_to_Client__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Verification Kit to Client"))

rules.description: Updates the New Load Audit Performed by field with the User that updates the New Load Audit MMS003 field.

rules.formula: (NOT(CONTAINS(Onboarding_Progression__c , "Company Shell/EE Static Complete")) || ISBLANK(Onboarding_Progression__c) ) && NOT(ISNULL(Calendar_Set_up__c)) && NOT(ISNULL(Earning_and_Deductions__c)) && NOT(ISNULL(Check_Printing__c)) && NOT(ISNULL(Locations_Branches__c)) && NOT(ISNULL(State_Local_Tax_IDs__c)) && NOT(ISNULL(Reports__c)) && (NOT(ISNULL(Earning_Code_Sets__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Earning Code Sets")) && (NOT(ISNULL(GL__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "GL")) && Codes")) && (NOT(ISNULL(X401K_Centers__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "401K Centers")) && NOT(ISNULL(Billing__c)) && (NOT(ISNULL(Tax_Exempts__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Tax Exempts")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Time_Off_Accrual__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Time Off Accrual")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Agency_Checks__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Agency Checks")) && NOT(ISNULL(Sales__c)) && (NOT(ISNULL(Misc_Options__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Misc Options")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Extra_Fields__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Extra Fields")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Company_Flags__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Company Flags")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Paychex_Options__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Paychex Options")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Conversion_Target_Date__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Conversion Target Date")) && NOT(ISNULL(Delivery__c)) && NOT(ISNULL(Products__c)) && NOT(ISNULL(Employee_Static__c)) && (NOT(ISNULL(Recurring_Earning_Deductions__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Recurring Earning & Deductions")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Target_Balance__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Target Balance")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Locals_Setup__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Locals Setup")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Direct_Deposits__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Direct Deposits")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Remove_Prenotes__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Remove Prenotes")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Code_1099_s__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Code 1099's")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Verification_Kit_to_Client__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Company_Shell__c, "Verification Kit to Client"))

(NOT(CONTAINS(Onboarding_Progression__c , "ENS Set-Up Complete")) || ISBLANK(Onboarding_Progression__c)) && ISPICKVAL(ENS_Set_up_Mandatory__c, "Yes") && NOT(ISNULL(ENS_Submission_Date__c)) && (NOT(ISNULL( Readychex_Received_Date__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_ENS_Set_up__c, "Readychex")) && (NOT(ISNULL( SigFont_Received_Date__c )) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_ENS_Set_up__c, "SigFont")) && (NOT(ISNULL( Logo_Received_Date__c )) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_ENS_Set_up__c, "Logo")) && NOT(ISNULL( ID_Formats_Verified_and_Submitted__c ))

(NOT(CONTAINS(Onboarding_Progression__c , " Installation and Training Complete")) || ISBLANK(Onboarding_Progression__c)) && (NOT(ISNULL(Preview_Install__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Installation_and_Training__c, "Preview Install")) && (NOT(ISNULL(IFT_Set_up__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Installation_and_Training__c, "IFT Set up")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Preview_Hosting__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Installation_and_Training__c, "Preview Hosting")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Advanced_Training_HR_Module__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Installation_and_Training__c, "Advanced Training - HR Module")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Preview_Training__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Installation_and_Training__c, "Preview Training")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Advanced_Training_GL__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Installation_and_Training__c, "Advanced Training - GL")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Advanced_Training_RW__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Installation_and_Training__c, "Advanced Training - RW")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Encryption_Key__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Installation_and_Training__c, "Encryption Key"))

(NOT(CONTAINS(Onboarding_Progression__c , " Interfaces Set-up Complete")) || ISBLANK(Onboarding_Progression__c)) && ISPICKVAL(ENS_Set_up_Mandatory__c, "Yes") && (NOT(ISNULL(Custom_Reports__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Interfaces_Set_up__c, "Custom Reports")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Other_Interface__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Interfaces_Set_up__c, "Other Interface")) && (NOT(ISNULL(GL_Interface__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Interfaces_Set_up__c, "GL Interface")) && (NOT(ISNULL(TLO__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Interfaces_Set_up__c, "TLO"))&& (NOT(ISNULL(Expense_Manager__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Interfaces_Set_up__c, "Expense Manager")) && (Benetrac__c || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Interfaces_Set_up__c, "Benetrac"))

rules.fullName: OC Tax%2C Wage and Balance WF
rules.formula: (NOT(CONTAINS(Onboarding_Progression__c , "Tax, Wage and Balance Complete")) || ISBLANK(Onboarding_Progression__c)) && (NOT(ISNULL(Prior_Quarter_Wages__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Tax_Wage_and_Balance__c , "Prior Quarter Wages") ) && (NOT(ISNULL(Prior_Quarter_Balanced__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Tax_Wage_and_Balance__c , "Prior Quarter Balanced")) && NOT(ISNULL(Current_Quarter_Wages__c))&& (NOT(ISNULL(Current_Quarter_Balanced__c)) || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Tax_Wage_and_Balance__c , "Current Quarter Balanced")) && (QTD_YTD_Data_Load_of_Wages__c || INCLUDES( Not_Applicable_Tax_Wage_and_Balance__c , "QTD YTD Data Load of Wages")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Quarter_1_Liabilities_Complete__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Tax_Wage_and_Balance__c , "Quarter 1 Liabilities Complete")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Quarter_2_Liabilities_Complete__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Tax_Wage_and_Balance__c , "Quarter 2 Liabilities Complete")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Quarter_3_Liabilities_Complete__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Tax_Wage_and_Balance__c , "Quarter 3 Liabilities Complete")) && (NOT(ISNULL(Quarter_4_Liabilities_Complete__c)) || INCLUDES(Not_Applicable_Tax_Wage_and_Balance__c , "Quarter 4 Liabilities Complete"))

rules.fullName: Taxpay Indicator from Product Summary WF
